_comment: This is a template configuration file for the test suite. Please fill in the required parameters before running the evaluation.
agents_comment: List of agents to be used in the test suite. Include paths to YAML files defining the agents.
llm_models_comment: List of LLM models to be used in the test suite. Each model should have a name and environment variables for configuration.

llm_models.name_comment: Name of the LLM model. This will be used to identify the model in the test suite.
llm_models.name: gpt-4-1
llm_models.env_comment: Environment variables required for the LLM model. These should be set in this file or in a .env file.

env._comment: A key ending with '_VAR' indicates that the value points to a variable in the .env file.

results_dir_name_comment: Name of the directory where the results of the test suite will be stored. This directory will be created if it does not exist.
runs_comment: Number of times each test case should be run. Default value is 1.
test_cases_comment: List of test cases to be executed in the test suite.
evaluation_settings_comment: Settings for the evaluation of the test cases. These settings control how the results are evaluated.

evaluation_settings.tool_match_comment: Evaluates the tools used to generate the response. Enabled by default.
evaluation_settings.response_match_comment: Evaluates the final response based on rouge metric. Enabled by default.
evaluation_settings.llm_evaluator_comment: Evaluates the tools, artifacts, and final response generated based on the LLM model. Disabled by default.

llm_evaluator.env_comment: Environment variables required for the LLM evaluator.

env._comment: A key ending with '_VAR' indicates that the value points to a variable in the .env file.
